reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from Gran Canaria and had a loverly time in the Sun - a great escape from our British winter. We couldn't fault our apartment at the Regina Mar. Room was basic but clean and functional with maid service and towels changed daily. Its in a great location with a great little supermarket nearby and only a short walk from the beach. Bus stops are close too and the bus ride to Peuto de Morgan is a must.
reviews.title: Great location, Great apartment....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: love the view

reviews.text: good food and service ,handy for all things. staff very helpful excellent for our age group.
reviews.title: Nice hotel,popular with oap's!

likes.disliked: — Noisy road at rear ofbuilding, no younger people!

reviews.text: We have just returned from a 9 night stay in this hotel.
reviews.title: Good location, basic apartments. Could be cleaner.
